abstract: Stocks have mixed performance as investors await final negotiations in Greek debt crisis; Chinese market plunges 7 percent as fears mount concerning end to bull rally.
lead_paragraph: The Dow had modest gains, but the S.&P. 500 and Nasdaq dropped. Nike was up 4 percent after it reported earnings that beat analysts’ expectations.

headline.main: Concerns in China and Greece Weigh on the Market
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Is Mixed as Investors Size Up Greece and China

snippet: The Dow had modest gains, but the S.&P. 500 and Nasdaq dropped. Nike was up 4 percent after it reported earnings that beat analysts’ expectations.
